data.message: See that's crazy we think every verse in this song is amazing and yet Em says the original half of the first verse was better like how the fuck can it be any better that's crazy to think about

replies.message: Yeah he probably had more clever lines but his notebook was lost so he had to rewrite the songs he wrote that made mmlp sometimes your best work is the work you first start with.. If you lose a body of work, the next attempt wouldn't be as good (even though mmlp is an incredible album and lyrically his best imo )
Also sometimes when someone does something the first time, could be better than the second time, and sometimes the other way around
